name: Flappy Trump - Switch Color of the Donald's Hat
name_original: Flappy Trump - Switch Color of the Donald's Hat
description:
Flappy Trump is a fast paced color switching game. Fly Trump through obstacles that change colors along with his hat. The rule is simple, your Flappy Trump can pass through the color that matches his hat.

> Tap to keep Flying
> Pass through the color that matches his hat color
> Beat your friends!

This game is for entertainment purposes only, and is meant to be comedic satire! Have fun.
